about:
Skilled in building responsive, user-friendly web applications. My expertise in creating functional components, state management with Redux and a proven ability to integrate APIs. 


 I am passionate about developing responsive and dynamic web applications, utilizing the power of frontend technologies like HTML, CSS, React, and JavaScript. I excel at creating user-friendly interfaces and ensuring smooth functionality with API integration. My focus is on delivering high-quality, interactive, and performance-optimized websites that enhance user experience. Looking ahead, my goal is to expand my skills and become a full-stack developer, mastering both frontend and backend technologies. I have successfully delivered high-quality solutions on small to large-scale projects.
